text:
Hey there.
I am using the HubSpot API as part of custom code in workflows.
Whenever I try to copy paste the code that is part of the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects|API documentation>, it does not properly work inside the workflows.
For instance: when retrieving properties from a custom object, it does not recognize the suggested command for the call.
How is that possible?
Is there a way to know how to adapt my call?

Your help would save me from loosing days for countless attempts :sweat_smile::blush:

Hey <@U01DSCCL4T1>, I don't think it worked with just copy and paste for me either, I usually write requests myself in JavaScript.

If you need assistance ping me and we can check it out tomorrow. I can find one of the examples I created in the past and I can help you with making first call. After that it should be fairly simple for yourself to make other requests.
